ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Companions of the Thicket denied the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The people of the Wood too called the messengers liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The people of Aykah also gave the lie to the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The dwellers of the forest also rejected the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The People of the Woods denied the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The companions of Al-Aykah denied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The dwellers of the thicket gave the lie to the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The men of the Thicket cried lies to the Envoys
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The dwellers in the wood (of Midian) denied the messengers (of Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The dwellers of the forest also rejected the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The dwellers of the wood belied the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The inhabitants of Aykah impugned the apostles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Companions of the Wood rejected the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The dwellers of Al-Aiyka [near Madyan (Midian)] belied the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The dwellers of the Thicket belied their Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The People of the Woods disbelieved the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The companions of the thicket denied the messengers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:176] The dwellers in the wood (a variant reading [for ashābu’l-aykati] has ashābu laykata), a thicket of trees near Midian, denied the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The dwellers in the wood (of Midian) denied the messengers (of Allah)) the people of Shu'ayb denied Shu'ayb just as they denied all the messengers mentioned to them by Shu'ayb,
